tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been to Dr Surbhi for a variety of gynae-issues and she gives her full attention each visit, explains the case thoroughly and clearly mentions the pro’s and cons of each solution available. She is very friendly, approachable, non-judgmental, and makes one feel comfortable to ask all our doubts, which she patiently answers. I would highly recommend visiting Dr Surbhi for any gynae-issues you might have!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr. Surbhi for my painful periods. She is very ************** patient, and understanding. She listened to all my issues and enquired about everything related to my health. After thorough examination of my full medical profile, she guided me in the right direction to manage my lifestyle to avoid painful periods. She prescribed some tests and examined the results carefully. She prescribed minimal medicines. She expressed her concern over some other realm of my health with complete transparency. Overall, it was a very holistic consultation. I was extremely satisfied with it, and it has helped me address issues related to other areas of health as well (not restricted to gynecology).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I've been dealing with recurrent yeast infections for a long time. Dr. Surbhi provided a detailed explanation that helped me understand the underlying causes. With the correct treatment my symptoms are getting better day by day.

I appreciated her emphasis on post-treatment care and her clear advice on managing yeast infections, which are often misunderstood. Her suggestions were invaluable.

I highly recommend Dr. Surbhi. She is non-judgmental, understanding, and genuinely cares about her patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Surbhi is the only doctor that helped treat my  recurrent UTI. I’d been dealing with it over a year — with no solution. What I needed was a doctor who would listen,  patiently go through my history and explain the possible causes — and Dr Surbhi was just that. I couldn’t recommend her more if you’re looking for a patient, compassionate doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been consulting Dr. Surbhi for more than 1.5 years and I not only trust her with my gynaecological care but also my mother's! She is friendly and will make you feel comfortable to talk about your issues. She takes the time to thoroughly explain the diagnosis, treatment options, and how the medication will work, including potential side effects. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for a good gynaecologist!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Surbhi after two ectopic pregnancies in the month of August'23. I had visited other doctors in the city to understand the why and what next of the case. However, I was always directed to "keep trying".  I visited Dr Surbhi to understand my case in detail. She not only  heard us(My husband and I) with patience but also guided us with the most scientific next steps while answering a lot of questions.With her strong knowledge in modern science, her empathy , She was able to identify multiple issues with a few medical tests. She presented options available to me based on my age and medical findings. She has handheld me in the entire journey since then. I strongly recommend her for her **** ********** sincerity, patience while handling patients and care for patient's well being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ****** ** ********* ************* ** *** ****** she explains everything really well and gives proper solution to it. her treatment is really smooth and she is very supportive and understanding as a person. Highly recommended. Non judgemental and friendly doctor. Once anyone will go to her, you'll become her patient for life.

tags: None
review: Dr. Surbhi is very gentle and will put the patient at ease instantly. She took the time out to make sure I understood her analysis and proposal for treatment. she ensured she had my consent and readiness for the tests she did. Even the most scary procedure felt easy because of how she handled it. I could speak my mind freely without the fear of being judged.

tags: None
review: ** ****** ** **** ************* *** ************* You can freely and openly ask her all questions or doubts and she takes time to explain things in a very simple language. She is also very reliable and has genuine care for her patients which is clearly visible. For all you young married or unmarried women she's your Go to doctor for any health issues. I feel so blessed to have her as my gynac. Thank you Dr Surbhi

tags: None
review: Dr. Surbhi has been patient throughout my treatment and explained every detail carefully. She was always positive and reassuring in her consultation, and was available over the phone for discussion as well. She examined the symptoms in detail and created a very safe environment for me to express my issues without the fear of judgment.
